personalInfo.aboutMe: Problem-solver software engineer with 5+ years of experience building frontend platforms for global teams. I partner closely with product and backend stakeholders to translate complex requirements into intuitive, reliable interfaces, and I care deeply about clean code, performance, and maintainability. I lead with curiosity, mentor teammates, and love shipping user-focused features that scale.
